Package com.hexaware.model

Class Payroll

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.model.Payroll
public class Payroll extends Object
Represents payroll information for an employee in the system.

  • Constructor Details

    • Payroll

      public Payroll()
      Default constructor for the Payroll class.

    • Payroll

      public Payroll(int payrollID, int employeeID, Date payPeriodStartDate, Date payPeriodEndDate, Double basicSalary, Double overtimePay, Double deductions, Double netSalary)
      Constructs a Payroll object with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      payrollID - The ID of the payroll record.
      employeeID - The ID of the employee associated with the payroll record.
      payPeriodStartDate - The start date of the pay period.
      payPeriodEndDate - The end date of the pay period.
      basicSalary - The base salary for the pay period.
      overtimePay - The additional pay for overtime hours.
      deductions - The total deductions for the pay period.
      netSalary - The net salary after deductions.

    • Payroll

      public Payroll(int employeeID, Date payPeriodStartDate, Date payPeriodEndDate, double basicSalary, double overtimePay, double deductions)
      Constructs a Payroll object with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      employeeID - The ID of the employee associated with the payroll record.
      payPeriodStartDate - The start date of the pay period.
      payPeriodEndDate - The end date of the pay period.
      basicSalary - The base salary for the pay period.
      overtimePay - The additional pay for overtime hours.
      deductions - The total deductions for the pay period.
